description: This file defines React components for UI elements related to a Card, including Card, CardHeader, and CardContent components. It specifies the visual structure and styling of card elements used within a React application.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: Renders a styled container with optional className and children.

methods.name: CardHeader
methods.description: Renders a header section for the Card with title, optional subtitle, and actions.

methods.name: CardContent
methods.description: Renders the content area inside the Card.
